channel.title: Comments on: Watch The OGs on The TODAY Show on Tuesday!

item.title: By: Layton.Gardner
item.dc:creator: Layton.Gardner
item.description: <strong>Your story on the Today Show</strong><br />Your story on the Today Show was very insperational for me. I hope when I am married, I will have the many great years you have been blessed with!
item.content:encoded:
Your story on the Today Show
Your story on the Today Show was very insperational for me. I hope when I am married, I will have the many great years you have been blessed with!

item.title: By: MissLynn
item.dc:creator: MissLynn
item.description: <strong>I love this. It is so</strong><br />I love this. It is so wonderful to see two people still acting like teenagers.
item.content:encoded:

I love this. It is so wonderful to see two people still acting like teenagers.
